divs: Sighting Details The video was set on the Columbia River and a hologram dimension of lights revealed a mother spece craft and an attached craft with creatures with pumpkin heads with wires on top and long legs moving glowing balls onto the attached vessel picked up by it. They can use light andmimick any object. As you seem to be the foremost authority on this subject, Are you affliated with the men in black as they are suspected of industrial sabotage as poteential espionage agents.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around June 1st 2009
Summary: Glowing balls collected by workers perhaps methane.
